# PHLivePhotoViewContentMode.aspectFit

**Case**

A mode that resizes the content to fit the view’s bounds, while preserving the content’s aspect ratio.

## Declaration

```swift
case aspectFit
```

## Content Modes

- **PHLivePhotoViewContentMode.aspectFill**: A mode that resizes the content to fill its horizontal or vertical dimension.

items.description: A mode that resizes the content to fill its horizontal or vertical dimension.
items.name: PHLivePhotoViewContentMode.aspectFill
